ygData.subject: RE: what trade window tactic?
ygData.msgSnippet: Its been awhile since i ve looked at my options, but isn t there is an option to turn off trading with people not in your group?  or something similar. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Its been awhile since i've looked at my options, but isn't there is an
option to turn off trading with people not in your group? or something
similar.

-----Original Message-----
From: Patrick Myers [mailto:chrisstauf@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 10, 1999 9:42 AM
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] what trade window tactic?


From: "Patrick Myers" <chrisstauf@...>

Well...here's how it works..you know how when you trade with someone the
window comes up...you can't do anything else while its up..so you get one of
your group members or buddies to keep bringing up a trade window as soon as
the baddie spawns. I'll give you an example..

Im up on trainer mountain trying for the Shiny Brass Shield..I'm all by
myself...I kill him couple of times..no shield..couple of people wander up
and we agree to rotate...we do this for about an hour when this mage comes
up..i inform him that the 4 of us have agreed to rotate to elimnate any hard
feelings..he informs me there is no rules or rotating and he will kill him
all he wants..I inform mage'boy that i will do whatever it takes to prevent
this including not playing fair. He tells me to go do something to
myself...It was someone elses turn for the trainer..so as soon as he spawned
i start trading crushbone belts to him...he cant get off but one spell,
cause i was a little slow with the mouse...the guy got his kill and the mage
left pissed...heheh..vengence was ours..

I say let them ban me...i refuse to let kill stealers ruin a good time. I
figure the worst they can do the first time is give me a warning and I have
yet to even get that...the fact is they can turn off their trade
window...but at least this gives you some ammo...

good luck
